task.summary: Set src folder as source in IntelliJ Project Structure (i.e. recognizes classes within src folder)
Changed the Stack<> to not be Transaction since this class will need to be used for User, Bank, and Portfolio. Still needs to be finalized.

Numerous changes in the overall structure have been made. I have created a Bank class that implements Banking to allow for separation of fund balances between Bank and Portfolio. I have noted with //TODO comments what needs to be fixed (though there is probably more that I missed). I did not get a chance to update the Account class in light of these changes, thus the majority of it has been marked off in a multiline comment. More changes will be made tomorrow (1/1/19).
Account: Added fields and made them static. Added basic request and make transaction methods. Bank: Changed constructor. Portfolio: Made fields static
Considerable redesigning of most classes. Still has several bugs related to the updating of various balances. Does not have full Portfolio functionality.

Balance mechanism and transactions work, minus SELL for assets (doesn't update Bank balance and returns correctly). Will change timeHeld to some other type to get finer resolution of time. Includes Testing class that prints out example account information and the four supported transaction types (DEPOSIT, WITHDRAW, BUY, SELL).

Updated returns calculation to account for number of shares of the asset being sold.
Removed the parameter of a request user from the Transaction constructor. It is unnecessary to require a requested when first creating a transaction. Requested user set in the requestTransaction() method.
Fixed: setter method for requestUser was setting the resolveUser, not the requestUser
Changed: setReqUser to setRequestUser
Added: in Testing.java, added .requestTransaction() after each transaction instantiation to ensure the requestUser is set before getting it.
Changed: relocated the setting of the requestDate, setting of the transactionID, and the adding of a transaction to the transactionRequest list from the Transaction constructor and to requestTransaction().
Fixed: selling of assets correctly updates Bank balance; had to move the setting of finalPrice in Testing.java to before it the transaction is resolved.
Added: to Testing.java, verification that timestamps of Portfolio and Bank balances match with the corresponding associated transaction, if one exists (buying/selling only).

Fully commented with JavaDoc (probably needs revisions). Added admin functionality to resolving transactions, and adding/removing users. Added runtime user confirmation before requesting/resolving transactions. Changed resolving action, so a cancelled resolution keeps the request in the requestedTransactions list. Added basic functionality to short/cover stocks.

Fully commented with JavaDoc (probably needs revisions). Added admin functionality to resolving transactions, and adding/removing users. Added runtime user confirmation before requesting/resolving transactions. Changed resolving action, so a cancelled resolution keeps the request in the requestedTransactions list. Added basic functionality to short/cover stocks.

MESSAGE.value: Set src folder as source in IntelliJ Project Structure (i.e. recognizes classes within src folder)
Changed the Stack<> to not be Transaction since this class will need to be used for User, Bank, and Portfolio. Still needs to be finalized.

Numerous changes in the overall structure have been made. I have created a Bank class that implements Banking to allow for separation of fund balances between Bank and Portfolio. I have noted with //TODO comments what needs to be fixed (though there is probably more that I missed). I did not get a chance to update the Account class in light of these changes, thus the majority of it has been marked off in a multiline comment. More changes will be made tomorrow (1/1/19).
Account: Added fields and made them static. Added basic request and make transaction methods. Bank: Changed constructor. Portfolio: Made fields static
Considerable redesigning of most classes. Still has several bugs related to the updating of various balances. Does not have full Portfolio functionality.

Balance mechanism and transactions work, minus SELL for assets (doesn't update Bank balance and returns correctly). Will change timeHeld to some other type to get finer resolution of time. Includes Testing class that prints out example account information and the four supported transaction types (DEPOSIT, WITHDRAW, BUY, SELL).

Updated returns calculation to account for number of shares of the asset being sold.
Removed the parameter of a request user from the Transaction constructor. It is unnecessary to require a requested when first creating a transaction. Requested user set in the requestTransaction() method.
Fixed: setter method for requestUser was setting the resolveUser, not the requestUser
Changed: setReqUser to setRequestUser
Added: in Testing.java, added .requestTransaction() after each transaction instantiation to ensure the requestUser is set before getting it.
Changed: relocated the setting of the requestDate, setting of the transactionID, and the adding of a transaction to the transactionRequest list from the Transaction constructor and to requestTransaction().
Fixed: selling of assets correctly updates Bank balance; had to move the setting of finalPrice in Testing.java to before it the transaction is resolved.
Added: to Testing.java, verification that timestamps of Portfolio and Bank balances match with the corresponding associated transaction, if one exists (buying/selling only).

Fully commented with JavaDoc (probably needs revisions). Added admin functionality to resolving transactions, and adding/removing users. Added runtime user confirmation before requesting/resolving transactions. Changed resolving action, so a cancelled resolution keeps the request in the requestedTransactions list. Added basic functionality to short/cover stocks.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
